title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
description: When using Photon, there is a bug where the popup menu does not appear in the Java Editor ruler.
OB: When I open a Java editor and right click on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu is displayed to allow me to add breakpoints or marks.
EB: When I open a Java editor and right click on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear that allows me to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu should appear that allows addition of breakpoints or marks, but it does not.
